/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees and street lamps punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and light to the urban setting. The colors in the image are predominantly green, blue, and gray, painting a picture of a city alive with color and activity.
